thread.title: Quorum Celebrates Women in Energy, Announces Three Female Executives in Leadership Roles

author: cnbc.com
title: Quorum Celebrates Women in Energy, Announces Three Female Executives in Leadership Roles
text:
HOUSTON, March 7, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Quorum Software , the leader in digital transformation for the oil and gas industry, recently announced the promotion of three of its female employees in executive leadership roles. In time for International Women's Day on March 8, 2018, the announcement furthers Quorum's mission to empower women in the energy industry. The three leaders include: Lindsey Herndon Goodgion, executive vice president & chief sales officer, Anne Golenternek, vice president, and Megan Yunker, vice president of product marketing.
"Gender diversity among employees can benefit the performance of a company, and women account for a significant pool of talent, bringing diverse perspectives, teamwork, and creative problem-solving to the modern energy workplace," said Perry Turbes, President and CEO of Quorum. "Each of these employees have risen to the top because they possess the fundamental character it takes to be a leader – and they just happen to be women. We look forward to seeing Lindsey, Anne, and Megan's success in their new leadership roles at Quorum, as they continue breaking down barriers for women in the oil and gas industry."
Lindsey Herndon Goodgion, Executive Vice President & Chief Sales Officer
Lindsey Herndon Goodgion is the chief sales officer for Quorum. In her role, Goodgion is responsible for all sales, account management, and commercial activities worldwide. With 15 years of oil and gas industry experience, Goodgion has held a variety of roles within Quorum, including key roles in client delivery and product support. She holds a bachelor's degree from the University of Texas at Austin and an MBA from the McCombs School of Business at the University of Texas at Austin.
Anne Golenternek, Vice President
Anne Golenternek is a vice president at Quorum. In her tenure at Quorum, she has held a variety of positions, including leadership and executive roles in product development, project delivery, and long-term support. Her expertise in the midstream and pipeline sectors of the oil and gas industry comes from a background in product management and a vast number of software implementation projects, including pipeline, gathering, processing, and marketing applications. Golenternek currently oversees the engineering and development teams for Quorum's commercial and revenue applications.
Megan Yunker, Vice President of Product Marketing
Megan Yunker is the vice president of product marketing at Quorum. She brings over 10 years of success developing and executing go-to-market strategies for growing companies, combining modern tactics for demand generation with data-driven marketing. Her professional experience spans brand management, content marketing, sales enablement, analyst relations, public relations, demand generation, digital marketing, and marketing automation for enterprise software companies. She holds a Bachelor of Business Administration in Finance and an MBA from The University of Texas at Austin – Red McCombs School of Business.
About Quorum
Quorum offers an industry-leading portfolio of finance, operations and accounting software that empowers energy companies of all sizes to conquer their most complex business challenges. From the field to the back office, defying complexity is coded in our DNA and our software. This unmatched experience is why Quorum is the choice of eight of the largest public energy companies worldwide, 75 percent of LNG exporters throughout North America and 80 percent of all natural gas processed in the United States. Designed for digital transformation, the myQuorum software platform delivers open standards, mobile-first design and cloud technologies to empower innovation at the speed of thought. At Quorum, we're helping visionary leaders transform their business, and the energy industry, for a digital world. For more information, visit www.quorumsoftware.com .
